job_purpose: To support the activities of the Perth Operations Team in preparing and programming products for creating energy-efficient working environments.
keywords: Solid knowledge of the Office application suite
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Documenting and labeling control system components
Assisting control system component assembly and testing
Dispatching, receiving, picking, and packing deliveries
Learning control system software and protocols to progress to a more senior technical role
required_qualifications: Solid knowledge of the Office application suite
company_details: mySmart is an Australian company focused on providing building control and energy management solutions across various markets. They prioritize making a positive difference for customers, employees, and the environment.
